author: jerenkrantz
msg: Fix issue with chunked keep-alive responses when the initial chunk content
(keepalive_read_chunk): Don't inspect resp->chunk with respect to
validity; re-order comparisons to make a bit more sense.
(keepalive_recv_resp): Be sure that chunk_length is always initialized.

author: hansbak
msg: make sure that not a single cancelled task set the project status to cancelled

author: hansbak
msg: added view ProductFacilityAndPostalAddress, to be able to list products by geographic location

author: dblevins
msg: Explicitly cut out asm and xbean-finder so that they don't wind up in the openejb-standalone distrobution

author: dblevins
msg: Make spring a non-required dependency for openejb-core
